definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: The breeding process and characteristics of Jia 66A were introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹了嘉66A的選育過程及特徵特性。

sentences.english: It suggested that the comprehensive selection index designed in this study was feasible.

sentences.english: Our results provide the tools for the Hizikia's genetic breeding and germplasm identification in the future.

sentences.english: The combining ability is important parameter of breeding on high photosynthesis hybrid pepper varieties.

sentences.english: Selecting high nitrogen use efficiency (NUE) hybrid maize plays the most important role for high yield and high NUE in maize production.
sentences.chinese: 選育氮高效品種是實現玉米高產高效生產的根本途徑。

sentences.english: It supplied favorable condition for breeding new varieties of lawn grass.

sentences.english: The most active method to prevent bruchid is resistance mungbean breeding.

sentences.english: The aim was to provide the theoretical basis for genetic breeding of Aohan merino sheep.
sentences.chinese: 爲敖漢細毛羊的遺傳選育提供理論依據。

sentences.english: Aerospace mutation could be used as to obtain new entomopathogenic strain for biological control.

sentences.english: N efficiency can be enhanced by breeding for cabbage.
